name: Knickerbocker Ice Company, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company
name_abbreviation: Knickerbocker Ice Co. v. Pennsylvania Railroad

judges: Before Mitchell, C. J., Fell, Mesteezat, Pottee and Elkin, JJ.
parties: Knickerbocker Ice Company, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Elkin,
For the reasons stated in the opinion handed down in the case of American Ice Company v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company at No. 78, January Term, 1909, ante, p. 439, judgment of nonsuit is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Elkin,

casebody.head_matter:
Knickerbocker Ice Company, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.
April 12, 1909:
Argued March 24, 1909.
Appeal, No. 79, Jan. T., 1909, by plaintiff, from order of C. P. No. 3, Phila. Co., March T., 1907, No. 1,452, refusing to take off nonsuit in case of the Knickerbocker Ice Company v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.
Before Mitchell, C. J., Fell, Mesteezat, Pottee and Elkin, JJ.
Affirmed.
